item.title: Videographer for Shooting Sports Competition in Marengo, OH Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a videographer in or near Marengo, OH, to film a shooting competition in Mesa, AZ., on June 28, 29, and 30 (about 5 to 6 hours per day). Our videographer is out of the country at that time, and we need someone to fill his shoes for the event.

We need to get videos of angles, subjects, and things similar to the following videos:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZlTORpugs8w
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WIzHWxRJvis

We will have 2 competitors who need to be filmed, along with b-roll footage of other competitors, the venue, equipment, etc.

We need one videographer with one camera, preferably a Sony FX3 or something comparable with a gimbal and a rode mic with a dead cat. Having a set of wireless lav mics will come in handy for quick interview-type footage we can splice in between the action shots.

We can provide all the equipment, but we would have to bring everything from California, so we prefer that you have comparable equipment.

There is no need to edit the videos. We just need the raw footage, as we have an editing team.

Please apply if you are available next Friday through Sunday.

Hourly Range: $40.00-$75.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 04:32 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Sports & Recreation, Videography
Skills: Sports & Recreation, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
